TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saml2AuthenticationContext extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the AuthnContext element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.7.2.2].

remarks.format:
## Remarks This base class does not directly support any by-value authentication context declarations (represented in XML by the AuthnContextDecl element). To support by-value declarations, extend this class to support the data model and extend the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler> class, overriding the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler.ReadAuthenticationContext%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler.WriteAuthenticationContext%2A> methods to read and write the by-value declaration.
For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationContext.ClassReference%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationContext.DeclarationReference%2A> properties are set to `null` in the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationContext> instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri classReference) cil managed

Docs.param: The class reference of the authentication context.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified class reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationContext.DeclarationReference%2A> property is set to `null` in the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationContext> instance.

Docs.exception: is not and is not an absolute URI.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of zero or more unique identifiers (URIs) of authentication authorities that were involved in the authentication of the principal (not including the assertion issuer, who is presumed to have been involved without being explicitly included in the collection). [Saml2Core, 2.7.2.2]
Docs.value: Returns a collection of type that identifies the authenticating authorities that were involved in the authentication of the principal.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URI reference that identifies an authentication context class that describes the authentication context declaration that follows. [Saml2Core, 2.7.2.2]
Docs.value: A that identifies the context class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ClassReference element. This can be one of URI constants defined in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Constants.AuthenticationContextClasses> class.

Docs.exception: An attempt to set a value that is not and is not an absolute URI occurs.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a URI reference that identifies an authentication context declaration. [Saml2Core, 2.7.2.2]
Docs.value: A that identifies an authentication context declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AuthnContextDeclRef element. By-value declarations are not supported in the base implementation. See Remarks in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationContext> class topic for more information.

Docs.exception: An attempt to set a value that is not and is not an absolute URI occurs.
